entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
